name: Tony Hawk Puzzle Skater
description:
I made this game for Tony Hawk Jam. That means this game was made for Tony Hawk and Tony Hawk ONLY.

Use the arrow keys to move around. Collect S-K-A-T-E to complete the level. Hit ramps for sick jumps. If you move twice before hitting a ramp you jump further!

This game has not been endorsed or sponsored by Tony Hawk.

Listen to this while you play
